name: News Media Europe
goal:
News Media Europe is an organisation representing and promoting the interests of the modern news media industry in the European Union.

News Media represents publishers worth over Euro 12 billion and more than 2,200 titles.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation
euInitiatives: Freedom of Press, Audiovisual Media Services Directive, Commercial and advertising, Contract law and freedom to contract, Copyright, Data Protection, Digital single market, Taxation, VAT, Fair Competition and Public Service Broadcasters, Online Platforms, Freedom of Information, Print and Environment
